Html:
Hello,
How can I make the vertical axis non-pannable and constant range?
There will be values only in a known range [0-100] so when there are only values in say [10-20], ChartPlotter fits to that area. But when comparing different charts, perception of the values is wrong.

Example:
In Chart A, there are only values between 10-20.
In Chart B, there are only values between 0-80.
If both charts are zoomed to fit, they will look similar. If they would fit to 0-100 vertical axis, then their values would be visually comparable.

Regards,
Kerem.

Hello Kerem,

You might want to check my answers in:

http://dynamicdatadisplay.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=225274

http://dynamicdatadisplay.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=225444

that cover how to specify the x and y axes and how to prevent zooming/panning

Regards
